name: @bublikus/native-suggestions
description: Datalist with native suggestions for text input fields.

scripts.patchPublish: func() { npm run build && git add . && git commit -m "$1" && npm version patch && git push && npm publish; }; func
scripts.minorPublish: func() { npm run build && git add . && git commit -m "$1" && npm version minor && git push && npm publish; }; func
scripts.majorPublish: func() { npm run build && git add . && git commit -m "$1" && npm version major && git push && npm publish; }; func

author: Bublikus
